chart_description: This chart displays the rate at which processes are being killed due to out of memory (OOM) errors in the system. When a system runs low on memory, the kernel will select a process to terminate to make more memory available. This chart helps determine if the system is experiencing an unusually high number of OOM kills, which may indicate a need for more memory or better memory management.

dimension_descriptions.kills: The number of processes being killed due to OOM errors per second.
